main event: A reddish-colored fast object, four feet in diameter, was sighted several times over Fort Bragg, California on August 3, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed visually from the ground, with the observer near Fort Bragg, California.
The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 5,500 feet.
Other similar objects were reported in the area, and were believed to be weather balloons.
No fighter jets were scrambled, and no contact or sightings were made.
The report was received by the duty controller at 4:55 PM PDT on August 3, 1952.
sighted object: a reddish-colored fast object, four feet in diameter
